title: Build an Edge version of System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser Control
body: The WebBrowser control is a commonly used control in desktop application development. (e.g. It's a key component of the Dynamics CRM Universal Service Desk application)

comments.body: This is important for people who use HTML embedded in other Windows applications. Right now, the WebBrowser control in both WinForms and WPF will use the Trident rendering engine (IE), which is inadequate for modern web apps. This forces us to use other options like Chromium Embedded.
